title: Audience participation!
content:
You! Yes, you! The person reading this!
Did you know that you can submit your own default article to display right here?
Just go to the Issues page on Github and submit your ideas! Each submission will be manually reviewed by me before being approved and included in the website, so don't try to pull a fast one on me because you will soon be disappointed. Moreover, remember that the Github repository for this website is public, so don't share any sensitive information!
Thank you for your interest in the HTML Article Generator :)
author: By the creator.
